name: Balls! Balls!
description:
A bright and colorful world full of interesting puzzles and challenges. The game has 32 unique levels, most of which have several options
passing that will not let you get bored sitting at the computer.
Save the balls and deliver them to the designated point to complete the level. As simple as it sounds, the difficulty increases with each level.
more and more...
The colorful graphic style will not let you get bored, as well as interesting mechanics tied to physics. Platforms, revolving platforms, transparent platforms, mines, lasers and much more! Try to complete the level in an unusual way and earn colorful stars that will help you purchase unusual items in the store. You completed the game and it seemed to you that there are not enough levels? You can play the game again, but this time with items purchased from the store to add even more variety to the gameplay.
Realize the full power of "Balls! Balls!" using just one mouse button.
